AltName.entry: BUILT RIGHT OUT OF MY BACK YARD

Desc.entry: A Community Interest Company which develops and supports businesses that provide products or services with the aim of employing those who are severely disadvantaged in the labour market. Locally Broomby supports and provides staff for Busters Coffee Company which has a packaging and distribution branch in Sheffield for Fairtrade coffee; for Viewpoint - a social research business, which is carrying out a telephone survey of tenants for Sheffield Homes and Buster's Cafe at Grenoside Grange Hospital on Salt Box Lane.

category.entry: EDUCATION - TRAINING PROVIDERS AND EMPLOYMENT SUPPORT
